original_title: ICC Deputy Chairman meets Sports Minister
original_body_lines: The Deputy Chairman International Cricket Council (ICC) Imran Khwaja met Sports Minister Roshan Ranasinghe today, as part of the fact-finding mission into the allegations of political interference of cricket administration in Sri Lanka.
Khwaja, part of a three-member ICC committee appointed to look into these allegations, met Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) officials on Wednesday.
